concept.title: Personal Information
concept.shortdesc: You can use your MyPack Portal to access your personal, academic and financial information.

section.title: View Your Personal Information
section.p:
On the Personal Information tile, you will be able to view and update all of your personal information including:
Personal Details (Student ID number, Name and Preferred Names)
Contact Details (Email addresses, phone numbers)
Addresses
Emergency Contacts
Text/Email Notification Setup
Ethnicity
Privacy Restrictions
Residency
Veterans Information (Military Affiliation, Request Benefits Certification, Review Benefits Requests)
OIS Compliance Verification (for International students only)
Provide Social Security Number
Parent & Guardian Access
